reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Explains concepts clearly and always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Good professor, but the grading is tough. Make sure you study hard!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging lectures, but sometimes hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Very strict with lab work, but you learn a lot.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Amazing lectures! Makes complex ideas easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Good professor, but attendance is crucial for success.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Well-structured lectures and relevant examples. Tests are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but the lectures can be dry at times.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Makes the subject very relatable and interesting.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Challenging courses, but Dr. Harris is always willing to help students succeed.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures, but the exams are quite difficult.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Clear explanations, but the pace of the course is very fast.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Makes the subject come alive.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Great professor! Very approachable and talented.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the assignments are time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is very passionate about the environment. His field trips are the best part of the class.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Insightful lectures, but the exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures and encourages critical thinking.
